hosting_cdn_shared_info: See the Shared CDN option settings. Standard settings are applied by default, so you can get started quickly and easily. The advanced CDN Security and CDN Advanced options give you access to more settings.
hosting_cdn_shared_option_always_online_: The CDN continues to respond to requests, even if the original server experiences an outage.
hosting_cdn_shared_option_http_https_inf: Increased website performance and security with HTTP/2 protocol.
hosting_cdn_shared_option_dev_mode_info: Developer mode to force the CDN to systematically retrieve the values on the original server.
hosting_cdn_shared_option_brotli_info: Reduce the size of data transferred using Brotli's latest generation algorithms.
hosting_cdn_shared_option_cache_rule_add: The {{range}} CDN solution allows you to add a maximum of {{maxItems}} rules.
hosting_cdn_shared_help: Need help with your website’s statistics and logs?
hosting_cdn_shared_option_cors_descripti: Specify the external domains that will be granted access to your web resources
hosting_cdn_shared_option_https_redirect: Protect all traffic to your website by redirecting it to HTTPS protocol temporarily or permanently.
hosting_cdn_shared_option_hsts_descripti: Require access to your website in HTTPS only. This way, your solution is secure against downgrade attacks.
hosting_cdn_shared_option_mixed_content_: Ensure that all content from your web pages loads securely, to deliver the best user experience. All of your website’s internal and external resources must be available in HTTPS.
hosting_cdn_shared_option_waf_descriptio: Use our firewall to protect your website against fraudulent attacks like injections, illegitimate requests, and data theft. Protect yourself from the most common vulnerabilities on the web by filtering requests and packets transmitted (the vulnerability list is managed and regularly updated by OVHcloud).
hosting_cdn_ssl_required_warning: Warning: the option you have enabled requires SSL to be active on the subdomain. Please check the SSL configuration on the subdomain.
hosting_cdn_shared_option_advanced_flush: Customise your purge by choosing which elements of the cache to clear: The entire website, a folder, a URI, a file extension, or using a custom regular expression. Advanced purge is available via the CDN Advanced option. Do you want to change options?
hosting_cdn_shared_option_query_string_i: Manage content caching based on the URL query parameters, also known as a ‘query string’. Depending on your configuration, the CDN will distribute the following resource:
hosting_cdn_shared_option_query_string_s: Disabled = The resource is cached by sorting its parameters.
Enabled - Sort Parameters = The resource is cached by sorting its parameters.
Enabled - Ignore Settings = The resource is cached without any parameters.
hosting_cdn_shared_option_prewarm_info: Force permanent caching of your critical resources. The CDN automatically anticipates and refreshes the cache, without waiting for a user request.
hosting_cdn_shared_option_http_geolocati: Detects the visitor’s country, and customises their experience. The country code is automatically added in the header of each request to be handled by your original server.
hosting_cdn_shared_option_prefetch_info: Anticipate the loading of the next resource. Prefetch the resource automatically in the cache using the Link header. This must be in the header of each page of the website requesting the prefetch.
hosting_cdn_shared_option_mobile_redirec: Automatically redirect visitors to a mobile-optimised website, if they are browsing on a mobile device. As a choice: redirect systematically to the root of another website, or keep the URL by only replacing the domain (or subdomain).
